archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: University Directory of Administrators and New Faculty, 1988 Collection, 1988
did.abstract: Collection consists of one-page vitas and photographs of administrators and new faculty in 1988 at Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Directory of Administrators and New Faculty 1998 Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Directory of Administrators and New Faculty 1998 Collection, Ms2005-004 Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Directory of Administrators and New Faculty 1998 Collection was donated to Special Collections in 2004.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The collection was originally housed in and apparently used by the Office of the President. James D. McComas was president of Virginia Tech from 1988-1993.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection was originally housed in and apparently used by the Office of the President. James D. McComas was president of Virginia Tech from 1988-1993.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by college or administrative office. Within the folder for an administrative office or college, names are listed alphabetically.
